Collaborators

research is rarely a solo endeavour!


Here is a list of scientists with whom I collaborated on different research projects.

PhD Research


Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Biology, Plön, Germany

  • Martin Kalbe Group Leader, Parasitology
  • Tina Henrich Postdoc, Parasitology
  • Tobias L. Lenz Group Leader, Evolutionary Immunogenomics
  • Irene E. Samonte-Padilla Postdoc

Queen Mary University of London, London, UK

  • Christophe Eizaguirre Reader, Evolutionary and Conservation Genetics of Aquatic Organisms

University College Cork, Cork, Ireland

  • Joshka Kaufmann Postdoc, Marine Institute, Newport

Institute for Evolution & Biodiversity, Münster, Germany

  • Jörn P. Scharsack Researcher, Animal Evolutionary Ecology

University of Bergen, Bergen, Norway

  • Per J. Jakobsen Professor, Department of Biology

Bolnick Lab, University of Texas, Austin, Texas, USA

  • Jesse N. Weber, Postdoc

Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft (DFG) - Priority Programme 1399



Master Research


Université Pierre et Marie Curie, Paris, France

  • Julien Gasparini Associate professor, Écophysiologie Évolutive
  • Adrien Frantz Associate professor, Écophysiologie Évolutive

ANSES, Maisons-Alfort, France

  • Karine Laroucau Animal Health Laboratory, Bacterial Zoonoses Unit, Maisons-Alfort

Université Toulouse III Paul Sabatier, Toulouse, France

  • Lisa Jacquin Associate professor, Écologie Aquatique
